02. Projects

Automated Inventory Management System

Developed an Automated Inventory Management System that streamlined inventory tracking and management processes for a retail client. The system utilized RFID technology and barcoding to monitor stock levels, automatically trigger reorders, and generate real-time reports.

This solution significantly reduced manual labor, minimized stockouts, and improved overall inventory accuracy, resulting in increased operational efficiency and cost savings for the client.

Built using ReactJS, TypeScript, NodeJS, Python, and MongoDB

Live Site
Github

Hospital Patient Care System

A comprehensive hospital management and patient care system. This project streamlines the entire healthcare process, from patient admissions and medical record management to appointment scheduling and billing.

It ensures efficient healthcare service delivery while enhancing patient care and administrative workflows.

Built using ReactJS, TypeScript, PostgreSQL, OAuth 2.0

Live Site
Github

Online Learning Platform

A comprehensive online learning platform that caters to educators and learners alike.

This project offers a user-friendly environment for learners to access a wide array of courses and resources while empowering educators to create, manage, and deliver educational content seamlessly.

Built using JavaScript, Tailwind, NodeJS

Live Site
Github
